issue.title: Python: rename package to "pyarrow"
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-54](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-54). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Unavoidable name conflict: pypi.python.org/pypi/arrow

comments.body:
